statement.text: A slightly lower target FICO<sup>®</sup> Score 8 of 633 could be met within 3 months with the following actions:

actions.text: Pay down $17,192 of your total revolving/open account balances of $57,308 every month for 3 months.
Pay all your bills on time for 3 months.
Stay current on your payments so that your most recent delinquency ages to 7 months.
Do not open any new accounts, so that the time since your most recently opened account ages to 9 months.
Do not open any new accounts, so that your average length of established history ages to 7 years, 1 month.
Continue to make your monthly installment loan payments on time to reduce the total installment loan balances of $101,418 you owe.
Do not apply for any new credit.
